content:
IETF WEBDAV Working Group Meeting

IETF-50, Minneapolis, Minnesota
March 22, 2001

A meeting of the WEBDAV Working Group was held March 22, 2001 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, as part of IETF-50. Prior to this meeting, an unofficial breakout session was held on the topic of moving RFC 2518 from Proposed Standard to Draft Standard status (March 21).

Meeting Information

Agenda
Minutes (text)

Meeting slides - Jim Whitehead's slides shown during the meeting (PowerPoint).
